name: Space Force
overview:
Space Force was produced by Venture Line in 1980.

Your spaceship is positioned in an asteroid field. Shoot at the rocks, blasting them into smaller and smaller pieces. Avoid the flying debris and the shots fired by the enemy UFOs.

Space Force is an Asteroids clone. It is a game in which your spaceship is positioned in an asteroid field. You must shoot at the rocks, blasting them into smaller and smaller pieces. Avoid the flying debris and the shots fired by the enemy UFOs.
